response.overview: Rasool is a teacher who has moved from a lush area in the north to the desert and hopes to keep the village safe from sandstorms with the help of his students, and to make it resemble his hometown by building a garden. His pregnant wife, Maryam, dies on a stormy night before reaching the doctor. After overcoming his mental crisis, Rasool plants many vegetables and herbs around the village with the help of his students.
response.title: Wilderness
